Articles.Content:
I've gotten quite a bit better at making turbines lately, but the engine wash on them just isn't enough to get them to spin fast enough. So, I'm conducting a bit of voluntary industrial espionage, if you will. Title says all, and thanks in advance.

Current Collection:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/128150-the-helicopter-hangar-submissions-open/

I made it!

Edited December 19, 2015 by The Optimist
I think redshift got one in the air but using fuel cheat

I have the only stock, non cheat, helicopters flying in 1.0.4. Both coaxial.

Unfortunately 1.0.5 killed them. Maybe you can modify them? I don't really have the time atm.

http://kerbalx.com/Azimech/77-Industries---CTR3-10

http://kerbalx.com/Azimech/Stock-Coaxial-Helicopter-77I--CTR3-Sky-Crane-10

12 minutes ago, Azimech said:

I have the only stock, non cheat, helicopters flying in 1.0.4. Both coaxial.

Unfortunately 1.0.5 killed them. Maybe you can modify them? I don't really have the time atm.

http://kerbalx.com/Azimech/77-Industries---CTR3-10

http://kerbalx.com/Azimech/Stock-Coaxial-Helicopter-77I--CTR3-Sky-Crane-10

Lucky for you, I've plenty of time since I have no life whatsoever. Yeah!

 

*sheds single tear*

Edited December 19, 2015 by The Optimist

Hey peeps! I got my turbine VTOL to work in 1.0.5 but didn't upload it. I'll dig it out for you. I'm not quit sure if you can classify it as a helicopter but it is lifted only by blades. I think it is one of the best performing rotary craft that still works in the game. No cheats needed.

http://www./download/vfa25r72bdbw5lk/Turbine_VTOL_saucer_1a.craft

Hotkey 1) Toggles side and rear engines

Hotkey 2) Toggles rotary engines

Hotkey 3) Toggles afterburners on rotary engines

Edited December 19, 2015 by Redshift OTF
